title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: APT Falls 5.1% as Index Declines from Tuesday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Near Protocol (NEAR) joined Aptos (APT) as an underperformer, also dipping 5.1%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3430.34, down 1.1% (-39.46) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

Two of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: XRP (+2.0%) and XLM (+1.7%).

Laggards: APT (-5.1%) and NEAR (-5.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index declined 1.1% with 18 of 20 assets trading lower, led by significant drops in APT and NEAR.
